Package tk.giesecke.spmonitor

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutoStart
    spMonitor - AutoStart Start refresh timer for app widgets (if widgets are placed
    DataBaseHelper
    spMonitor - DataBaseHelper Access to the spMonitor database
    ScreenReceiver
    ScreenReceiver Get screen on/off broadcast messages to start/stop the update of the app widgets
    SplashActivity
    spMonitor - SplashActivity Shows splash screen when app is started Searches for IP address of the spMonitor device
    spMonitor
    spMonitor - Main UI activity Shows life or logged data from the spMonitor
    SPwidget
    spMonitor - SPwidget Implementation of App Widget functionality.
    SPwidgetConfigureActivity
    spMonitor - SPwidgetConfigureActivity The configuration screen for the SPwidget AppWidget.
    Utilities
    spMonitor - Utilities Utilities used by SplashActivity and/or spMonitor
